collections_text:
# Home

Preserving the history, beauty, and artistry of perfume bottles, compacts, ephemera and related vanity items, the Perfume Passage Foundation seeks to educate and inspire visitors by illuminating the connection between perfume and the human experience. 

The Collection

Experience a sense of wonder at the beauty and rarity of the _Perfume Passage_ collection.

[Learn More](/collection)

The Galleries

Each space compliments its contents, evoking memories, emotions, and the atmosphere of an era lost in time.

[Explore](/galleries)

Plan Your Visit

The world of perfume is relevant, glamorous, and empowering to us all!

[Visit Us](/plan-visit)

Resources

Gain access to a wealth of information about all things perfumery.

[Browse Archive](/resources)
